# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(GDAL)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
GDALPluginInfo.C
GDALCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
GDALPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
GDALMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGDALFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
GDALEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGDALFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${GDAL_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)


SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/databases)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${GDAL_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IGDALDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IGDALDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IGDALDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MGDALDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MGDALDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${GDAL_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MGDALDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MGDALDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EGDALDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGDALDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${GDAL_LIB} )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EGDALDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGDALDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EGDALDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGDALDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${GDAL_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EGDALDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGDALDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
